metadata.title: CVE-2020-25815 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki 1.32.x through 1.34.x before 1.34.4.LogEventList::getFiltersDesc is insecurely using message text to buildoptions names for an HTML multi-select field. The relevant code should useescaped() instead of text().

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
